import React, {useState} from 'react'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import { Field, reduxForm } from 'redux-form'; import t from './executing.module.css' const TakeTaskModalWindow = (props)=> { return (
create task

name

sunmane

phone

time to confirm

) } const TakeTaskModalWindowRedux = reduxForm({ form:'descriptionTask' })(TakeTaskModalWindow) export default TakeTaskModalWindowRedux
